coded_answer.p: With reference to the show last week., I am writing to complain about the show, which was very disappointeddisappointing.

In the advertisement, it statestates that the actor forin this show is Danny Brook and TINA TRUELOVE. As a result I asked my acquintanceacquaintance to come with me to the show. As soon as the show started., I realised that the actor wasn't DANNY.

I was very disappointed. In addition the concert didn't start on time. It was a quarter of an hour late. If I knewhad known that the show was going to be late, I would askhave asked my mom to come with me, because her working hourday ended at eight o'clock. The restaurant was closed after the show ended. On the other handAlso there were no discounts available, as. As a result I had to paidpay extra money for the tickets.
In conclusion, it wasn't a perfect evening,. I didn't enjoy it at all due to the failureinaccurate advertisement. I would like to ask for my money back.
Unfortunately, Pat wasn't very good at keeping secrets. As a result Mallory had been arrested by the police two years ago. In addition he had to serve a life sentencessentence.

The story began in 1989 in New York. Mallory and his partner, Pat, had plannedthought up the best plan in the world, which was to steal the diamond from the national bank. As a resultHowever, the only way to get into the building was at the top of the buildbuilding. Their plan was to cut the alarm from the top of the building. The alarm was situated at the top. So they could take their time, rather than going in atthrough the front door. As soon as Mallory stole the diamond. He, he ran away. Unfortunately the guard saw him. By the time he got out of the building, the cops waswere everevery whereeverywhere but as long as Mallory is alive, he won't be arrested, with his unpredicatableunpredictable mind. He ran into the old buildbuilding, and hiddenhid a diamond in there. Unfortunately, the building was a police station.
